[TABLE]

  

Huxtable is an R package to create LaTeX and HTML tables, with a
friendly, modern interface. Features include control over text styling,
number format, background color, borders, padding and alignment. Cells
can span multiple rows and/or columns. Tables can be manipulated with
standard R subsetting or `dplyr` functions.

## Quick Examples

### Simple table

``` R
ht <- hux(
        Employee = c("John Smith", "Jane Doe", "David Hugh-Jones"),
        Salary = c(50000, 50000, 40000),
        add_colnames = TRUE
      )

bold(ht)[1,]           <- TRUE
bottom_border(ht)[1,]  <- 0.4
align(ht)[,2]          <- "right"
right_padding(ht)      <- 10
left_padding(ht)       <- 10
width(ht)              <- 0.35
number_format(ht)      <- 2

ht
```

| Employee         |   Salary |
|------------------|---------:|
| John Smith       | 50000.00 |
| Jane Doe         | 50000.00 |
| David Hugh-Jones | 40000.00 |

### Pipe interface

``` R
library(magrittr)
ht <- hux(
        Employee = c("John Smith", "Jane Doe", "David Hugh-Jones"),
        Salary = c(50000, 50000, 40000)
      )

ht |>
      set_bold(1, everywhere)             |>
      set_bottom_border(1, everywhere)    |>
      set_align(everywhere, 2, "right")   |>
      set_lr_padding(10)                  |>
      set_width(0.35)                     |>
      set_number_format(2)
```

| Employee         |   Salary |
|------------------|---------:|
| John Smith       | 50000.00 |
| Jane Doe         | 50000.00 |
| David Hugh-Jones | 40000.00 |

### Conditional formatting

``` R
mtcars[1:5, 1:5] |>
      as_huxtable(add_rownames = "Model") |>
      set_bold(1, everywhere, TRUE) |>
      set_all_borders(1) |>
      map_text_color(everywhere, "mpg", by_colorspace("navy", "red", "yellow")) |>
      map_background_color(everywhere, "hp", by_quantiles(0.8, c("white", "yellow"))) |>
      map_italic(everywhere, "Model", by_regex("Merc.*" = TRUE))
```

|             Model |  mpg | cyl | disp |  hp | drat |
|------------------:|-----:|----:|-----:|----:|------|
|         Mazda RX4 | 21   |   6 |  160 | 110 | 3.9  |
|     Mazda RX4 Wag | 21   |   6 |  160 | 110 | 3.9  |
|        Datsun 710 | 22.8 |   4 |  108 |  93 | 3.85 |
|    Hornet 4 Drive | 21.4 |   6 |  258 | 110 | 3.08 |
| Hornet Sportabout | 18.7 |   8 |  360 | 175 | 3.15 |

### Table of regressions

``` R
data(diamonds, package = "ggplot2")

lm1 <- lm(log(price) ~ carat, diamonds)
lm2 <- lm(log(price) ~ depth, diamonds)
lm3 <- lm(log(price) ~ carat + depth, diamonds)

huxreg(lm1, lm2, lm3, statistics = c("N" = "nobs", "R2" = "r.squared"))
```

[TABLE]

### Quick document output

``` R
quick_pdf(mtcars)
quick_docx(mtcars)
quick_html(mtcars)
quick_xlsx(mtcars)
# Files are produced in the current working directory.
```

## Installation

From R-Universe:

``` R
install.packages("huxtable", repos = c(
  "https://hughjonesd.r-universe.dev",
  "https://cloud.r-project.org"
))
```

From CRAN:

``` R
install.packages("huxtable")
```

Development version from github:

``` R
library(devtools)
install_github("hughjonesd/huxtable")
```

## Learning more

Check out the [vignette](articles/huxtable.md).

## The name

Huxtable could stand for “Happy User Xtable”, or if you prefer, “Hyped
Up Xtable”, or for Germans maybe “Html Und teX Table”.

## Trivia

The logo above was randomly generated by huxtable, using
[`hux_logo()`](reference/hux_logo.md). The web page background uses
[Piet Mondrian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piet_Mondrian)’s
*Composition A*.

# Package index

## Overview

Get high-level documentation about the package

- [`huxtable-package`](huxtable-package.md) : Quick introduction to
  huxtable
- [`huxtable-options`](huxtable-options.md) : Package options
- [`huxtable-FAQ`](huxtable-FAQ.md) : Frequently Asked Questions,
  including how to get help
- [`huxtable-news`](huxtable-news.md) : Changes to the huxtable package
- [`rowspecs`](rowspecs.md) : Different ways to select rows and columns
- [`mapping-functions`](mapping-functions.md)
  [`mapping_functions`](mapping-functions.md) : How to set cell
  properties variably by cell contents

## Creating and manipulating huxtables

Create, subset, split and join huxtables

- [`` `[`( ``*`<huxtable>`*`)`](extract-methods.md)
  [`` `[<-`( ``*`<huxtable>`*`)`](extract-methods.md)
  [`` `$<-`( ``*`<huxtable>`*`)`](extract-methods.md)
  [`` `[[<-`( ``*`<huxtable>`*`)`](extract-methods.md) : Subset a
  huxtable
- [`add_colnames()`](add_colnames.md)
  [`add_rownames()`](add_colnames.md) : Add column or row names
- [`add_footnote()`](add_footnote.md) : Add a row with a footnote
- [`cbind(`*`<huxtable>`*`)`](cbind.huxtable.md)
  [`rbind(`*`<huxtable>`*`)`](cbind.huxtable.md) : Combine rows or
  columns
- [`column_to_header()`](column_to_header.md) : Convert a column to
  header rows
- [`huxtable()`](huxtable.md) [`hux()`](huxtable.md)
  [`tribble_hux()`](huxtable.md) : Create a huxtable
- [`as_huxtable()`](as_huxtable.md) [`as_hux()`](as_huxtable.md)
  [`is_huxtable()`](as_huxtable.md) [`is_hux()`](as_huxtable.md) :
  Convert objects to huxtables
- [`insert_column()`](insert_column.md)
  [`insert_row()`](insert_column.md) : Insert a row or column
- [`split_across()`](split-across-down.md)
  [`split_down()`](split-across-down.md) : Split a huxtable into
  multiple huxtables
- [`restack_across()`](restack-across-down.md)
  [`restack_down()`](restack-across-down.md) : Restack huxtables
  across/down the page
- [`add_rows()`](add_rows.md) [`add_columns()`](add_rows.md) : Insert
  one huxtable into another
- [`mutate.huxtable()`](dplyr-verbs.md) : Use dplyr verbs with huxtable
  objects
- [`t(`*`<huxtable>`*`)`](t.huxtable.md) : Transpose a huxtable

## Size and position

Size and position properties

- [`col_width()`](col_width.md) [`` `col_width<-`() ``](col_width.md)
  [`set_col_width()`](col_width.md) : Set the width of table columns
- [`height()`](height.md) [`` `height<-`() ``](height.md)
  [`set_height()`](height.md) : Set the table height
- [`position()`](position.md) [`` `position<-`() ``](position.md)
  [`set_position()`](position.md) : Set the table's position with
  respect to surrounding content
- [`row_height()`](row_height.md)
  [`` `row_height<-`() ``](row_height.md)
  [`set_row_height()`](row_height.md) : Set the height of table rows
- [`width()`](width.md) [`` `width<-`() ``](width.md)
  [`set_width()`](width.md) : Set the table width

## Table-level properties

Other table-level properties

- [`caption()`](caption.md) [`` `caption<-`() ``](caption.md)
  [`set_caption()`](caption.md) : Set the table caption
- [`caption_pos()`](caption_pos.md)
  [`` `caption_pos<-`() ``](caption_pos.md)
  [`set_caption_pos()`](caption_pos.md) : Position the table's caption
- [`caption_width()`](caption_width.md)
  [`` `caption_width<-`() ``](caption_width.md)
  [`set_caption_width()`](caption_width.md) : Set the width of the table
  caption
- [`label()`](label.md) [`` `label<-`() ``](label.md)
  [`set_label()`](label.md) : Set a table label for external referencing
- [`latex_float()`](latex_float.md)
  [`` `latex_float<-`() ``](latex_float.md)
  [`set_latex_float()`](latex_float.md) : Set the position of the table
  float in LaTeX
- [`tabular_environment()`](tabular_environment.md)
  [`` `tabular_environment<-`() ``](tabular_environment.md)
  [`set_tabular_environment()`](tabular_environment.md) : Set the
  table's tabular environment in LaTeX
- [`table_environment()`](table_environment.md)
  [`` `table_environment<-`() ``](table_environment.md)
  [`set_table_environment()`](table_environment.md) : Set the "table"
  environment in LaTeX

## Text properties

Style text in table cells

- [`background_color()`](background_color.md)
  [`` `background_color<-`() ``](background_color.md)
  [`set_background_color()`](background_color.md)
  [`map_background_color()`](background_color.md) : Set cell background
  color

- [`bold()`](bold.md) [`` `bold<-`() ``](bold.md)
  [`set_bold()`](bold.md) [`map_bold()`](bold.md) [`italic()`](bold.md)
  [`` `italic<-`() ``](bold.md) [`set_italic()`](bold.md)
  [`map_italic()`](bold.md) : Make cell text bold or italic

- [`escape_contents()`](escape_contents.md)
  [`` `escape_contents<-`() ``](escape_contents.md)
  [`set_escape_contents()`](escape_contents.md)
  [`map_escape_contents()`](escape_contents.md) : Escape or unescape
  text in cells

- [`fmt_percent()`](fmt_percent.md) : Format numbers as percent

- [`fmt_pretty()`](fmt_pretty.md) :

  Use [`prettyNum()`](https://rdrr.io/r/base/formatc.html) to format
  numbers

- [`font()`](font.md) [`` `font<-`() ``](font.md)
  [`set_font()`](font.md) [`map_font()`](font.md) : Set the font for
  cell text

- [`font_size()`](font_size.md) [`` `font_size<-`() ``](font_size.md)
  [`set_font_size()`](font_size.md) [`map_font_size()`](font_size.md) :
  Make text larger or smaller

- [`markdown()`](markdown.md) [`` `markdown<-`() ``](markdown.md)
  [`set_markdown()`](markdown.md) [`map_markdown()`](markdown.md) :
  Interpret cell content as markdown

- [`set_markdown_contents()`](set_markdown_contents.md) : Set cell
  contents, interpreting them as markdown

- [`contents()`](set_contents.md)
  [`` `contents<-`() ``](set_contents.md)
  [`set_contents()`](set_contents.md)
  [`map_contents()`](set_contents.md) : Set cell contents

- [`number_format()`](number_format.md)
  [`` `number_format<-`() ``](number_format.md)
  [`set_number_format()`](number_format.md)
  [`map_number_format()`](number_format.md) : Set how numbers are
  formatted in cells

- [`na_string()`](na_string.md) [`` `na_string<-`() ``](na_string.md)
  [`set_na_string()`](na_string.md) [`map_na_string()`](na_string.md) :
  Change how NA values are printed

- [`stripe()`](stripe.md) [`everywhere()`](stripe.md)
  [`evens()`](stripe.md) [`odds()`](stripe.md) : Return every n row or
  column numbers

- [`stripe_rows()`](stripes.md) [`stripe_columns()`](stripes.md) : Set
  background color stripes

- [`text_color()`](text_color.md)
  [`` `text_color<-`() ``](text_color.md)
  [`set_text_color()`](text_color.md)
  [`map_text_color()`](text_color.md) : Set the color of text in cells

- [`header_cols()`](header_cols.md)
  [`` `header_cols<-`() ``](header_cols.md)
  [`set_header_cols()`](header_cols.md)
  [`header_rows()`](header_cols.md)
  [`` `header_rows<-`() ``](header_cols.md)
  [`set_header_rows()`](header_cols.md) : Mark rows or columns as
  headers

## Borders and padding

Set borders, border colors and cell padding

- [`left_border()`](borders.md) [`right_border()`](borders.md)
  [`top_border()`](borders.md) [`bottom_border()`](borders.md)
  [`` `left_border<-`() ``](borders.md)
  [`` `right_border<-`() ``](borders.md)
  [`` `top_border<-`() ``](borders.md)
  [`` `bottom_border<-`() ``](borders.md)
  [`set_left_border()`](borders.md) [`set_right_border()`](borders.md)
  [`set_top_border()`](borders.md) [`set_bottom_border()`](borders.md)
  [`map_left_border()`](borders.md) [`map_right_border()`](borders.md)
  [`map_top_border()`](borders.md) [`map_bottom_border()`](borders.md) :
  Set borders

- [`left_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`right_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`top_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`bottom_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`` `left_border_color<-`() ``](border-colors.md)
  [`` `right_border_color<-`() ``](border-colors.md)
  [`` `top_border_color<-`() ``](border-colors.md)
  [`` `bottom_border_color<-`() ``](border-colors.md)
  [`set_left_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`set_right_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`set_top_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`set_bottom_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`map_left_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`map_right_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`map_top_border_color()`](border-colors.md)
  [`map_bottom_border_color()`](border-colors.md) : Set border colors

- [`left_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`right_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`top_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`bottom_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`` `left_border_style<-`() ``](border-styles.md)
  [`` `right_border_style<-`() ``](border-styles.md)

  [`` `bottom_border_style<-`() ``](border-styles.md)
  [`set_left_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`set_right_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`set_top_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`set_bottom_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`map_left_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`map_right_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`map_top_border_style()`](border-styles.md)
  [`map_bottom_border_style()`](border-styles.md) : Set border styles

  [`` `top_padding<-`() ``](padding.md)

  [`` `bottom_padding<-`() ``](padding.md)
  [`set_bottom_padding()`](padding.md)
  [`map_bottom_padding()`](padding.md) : Cell padding

- [`set_all_borders()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_all_borders()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_all_border_colors()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_all_border_colors()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_all_border_styles()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_all_border_styles()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_all_padding()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_all_padding()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_tb_padding()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_tb_padding()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_lr_padding()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_lr_padding()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_tb_borders()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_tb_borders()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_lr_borders()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_lr_borders()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_tb_border_colors()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_tb_border_colors()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_lr_border_colors()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_lr_border_colors()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_tb_border_styles()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_tb_border_styles()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`set_lr_border_styles()`](set-multiple.md)
  [`map_lr_border_styles()`](set-multiple.md) : Set left, right, top and
  bottom properties

- [`set_outer_borders()`](set-outer.md)
  [`set_outer_border_colors()`](set-outer.md)
  [`set_outer_border_styles()`](set-outer.md)
  [`set_outer_padding()`](set-outer.md) : Set borders and padding around
  a rectangle of cells

- [`brdr()`](brdr.md) : Create a border object

- [`brdr_thickness()`](brdr_thickness.md) :

  Get thickness of a [`brdr()`](../reference/brdr.md) object

## Layout

Change the layout of cells and tables

- [`align()`](align.md) [`` `align<-`() ``](align.md)
  [`set_align()`](align.md) [`map_align()`](align.md) : Set the
  horizontal alignment of cell content
- [`rowspan()`](spans.md) [`` `rowspan<-`() ``](spans.md)
  [`set_rowspan()`](spans.md) [`map_rowspan()`](spans.md)
  [`colspan()`](spans.md) [`` `colspan<-`() ``](spans.md)
  [`set_colspan()`](spans.md) [`map_colspan()`](spans.md) : Extend cells
  over multiple rows and/or columns
- [`rotation()`](rotation.md) [`` `rotation<-`() ``](rotation.md)
  [`set_rotation()`](rotation.md) [`map_rotation()`](rotation.md) :
  Rotate text within cells
- [`valign()`](valign.md) [`` `valign<-`() ``](valign.md)
  [`set_valign()`](valign.md) [`map_valign()`](valign.md) : Set the
  vertical alignment of cell content
- [`wrap()`](wrap.md) [`` `wrap<-`() ``](wrap.md)
  [`set_wrap()`](wrap.md) [`map_wrap()`](wrap.md) : Wrap cell content
  over multiple lines
- [`merge_across()`](merge_across.md) [`merge_down()`](merge_across.md)
  : Merge cells across rows or down columns
- [`merge_cells()`](merge_cells.md) : Merge a range of cells
- [`merge_repeated_rows()`](merge_repeated_rows.md) : Merge repeated
  rows into multirow cells

## Property manipulation

Change multiple properties with one command, and set defaults

- [`style_headers()`](style-functions.md)
  [`style_header_rows()`](style-functions.md)
  [`style_header_cols()`](style-functions.md)
  [`style_cells()`](style-functions.md)
  [`set_cell_properties()`](style-functions.md) : Set multiple
  properties on headers
- [`set_default_properties()`](set_default_properties.md)
  [`get_default_properties()`](set_default_properties.md) : Default
  huxtable properties

## Mapping functions

Set cell properties depending on cell contents

- [`by_cases()`](by_cases.md) :

  Map cell contents to properties using `case_when`

- [`by_colorspace()`](by_colorspace.md) : Map numeric cell contents
  smoothly to colors

- [`by_function()`](by_function.md) : Map cell contents to cell
  properties using a function or scale

- [`by_quantiles()`](by_quantiles.md)
  [`by_equal_groups()`](by_quantiles.md) : Map numeric quantiles to cell
  properties

- [`by_ranges()`](by_ranges.md) : Map numeric ranges to cell properties

- [`by_regex()`](by_regex.md) : Map cells matching a string or regex to
  cell properties

- [`by_rows()`](by_rows.md) [`by_cols()`](by_rows.md) : Set cell
  properties by row or column

- [`by_values()`](by_values.md) : Map specific cell values to cell
  properties

## Printing

Print to LaTeX, HTML, Word, Excel, RTF, markdown or on-screen

- [`as_flextable()`](as_flextable.md) : Convert a huxtable for
  Word/Powerpoint
- [`as_Workbook()`](as_Workbook.md) : Convert a huxtable for Excel
- [`guess_knitr_output_format()`](guess_knitr_output_format.md) : Guess
  knitr output format
- [`print_html()`](to_html.md) [`print_notebook()`](to_html.md)
  [`to_html()`](to_html.md) [`as_html()`](to_html.md) : Create HTML
  representing a huxtable
- [`print_latex()`](to_latex.md) [`to_latex()`](to_latex.md) : Create
  LaTeX representing a huxtable
- [`print_md()`](to_md.md) [`to_md()`](to_md.md) : Create Markdown
  representing a huxtable
- [`print_rtf()`](to_rtf.md) [`to_rtf()`](to_rtf.md) : Create RTF
  representing a huxtable
- [`print_screen()`](to_screen.md) [`to_screen()`](to_screen.md) : Print
  a huxtable on screen
- [`print_typst()`](to_typst.md) [`to_typst()`](to_typst.md) : Create
  Typst markup representing a huxtable
- [`print(`*`<huxtable>`*`)`](print.huxtable.md)
  [`format(`*`<huxtable>`*`)`](print.huxtable.md) : Format and print
  huxtables using a default method
- [`knit_print.huxtable()`](knit_print.huxtable.md) : Print a huxtable
  within knitr
- [`knit_print.data.frame()`](knit_print.data.frame.md) : Print data
  frames in knitr using huxtable
- [`rtf_fc_tables()`](rtf_fc_tables.md) : Create RTF font and color
  tables

## Quick output

Print huxtables or other data to a new file, using a one-liner

- [`quick_latex()`](quick-output.md) [`quick_pdf()`](quick-output.md)
  [`quick_typst()`](quick-output.md)
  [`quick_typst_pdf()`](quick-output.md)
  [`quick_typst_png()`](quick-output.md)
  [`quick_typst_svg()`](quick-output.md)
  [`quick_html()`](quick-output.md) [`quick_docx()`](quick-output.md)
  [`quick_pptx()`](quick-output.md) [`quick_xlsx()`](quick-output.md)
  [`quick_rtf()`](quick-output.md) : Quickly print objects to a PDF,
  TeX, Typst, HTML, Microsoft Office or RTF document, or PNG or SVG
  images

## Themes

Apply a coherent style to a huxtable

- [`theme_plain()`](themes.md) [`theme_bright()`](themes.md)
  [`theme_basic()`](themes.md) [`theme_compact()`](themes.md)
  [`theme_striped()`](themes.md) [`theme_grey()`](themes.md)
  [`theme_blue()`](themes.md) [`theme_orange()`](themes.md)
  [`theme_green()`](themes.md) [`theme_article()`](themes.md)
  [`theme_mondrian()`](themes.md) : Theme a huxtable

## Row specs

Specify rows and columns in `set_` functions

- [`stripe()`](stripe.md) [`everywhere()`](stripe.md)
  [`evens()`](stripe.md) [`odds()`](stripe.md) : Return every n row or
  column numbers
- [`final()`](final.md) : Return the last n rows or columns

## LaTeX dependencies

Manage LaTeX packages for huxtable

- [`report_latex_dependencies()`](report_latex_dependencies.md)
  [`check_latex_dependencies()`](report_latex_dependencies.md)
  [`install_latex_dependencies()`](report_latex_dependencies.md) :
  Manage LaTeX dependencies for huxtables

## Regression tables

Create a table of regressions

- [`huxreg()`](huxreg.md) : Create a huxtable to display model output

- [`tidy_override()`](tidy_override.md)
  [`tidy_replace()`](tidy_override.md)
  [`tidy(`*`<tidy_override>`*`)`](tidy_override.md)
  [`glance(`*`<tidy_override>`*`)`](tidy_override.md)
  [`nobs(`*`<tidy_override>`*`)`](tidy_override.md) :

  Change a model's `tidy` output

## Miscellaneous

Other functions

- [`hux_logo()`](hux_logo.md) : Huxtable logo
- [`jams`](jams.md) : Prices of 3 jams
- [`sanitize()`](sanitize.md) : Escape text for various formats

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Regression Tables with huxreg](huxreg.md):
- [Introduction to Huxtable](huxtable.md):
